attributes.action: we must say no to increasing pension age to 70
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: government are considering increasing private sector pension age to 70 - we must say no, especially as the private sector pension age is an average age of 59 - we the private sector are subsidising the public sector thhis is discrimination something the government promised to stamp out!!  we should be looking at reducing the pension age surely in this day of rife unemployment, let the oldies make way for the fit n healthy youngsters
